data.title: Andrew Pruett – Inside The Life Of Abigail Spencer’s Ex Husband
data.text:
(Last Updated On: )

BIOGRAPHY

Andrew is famous as Abigael’s ex husband. Abigael is a famous American actress. He was born on 1st February 1980 in the US. He has a bachelor degree in Science Film and Broadcasting from John Brown University.

He was married to Abigael Spencer in 2004. They divorced in 2013 after separating in 2012. They have a son together born on 19th September 2008 called Roman Pruett.

Currently has been dating Kristin Chenoweth an actress as well since 2015.

CAREER

Andrew started his career at Disney Interactive Media Group as a director of advertising sales in 2007. He also marketed for different sites that include Family.com, Disney.com and DisnyeChannel.com. He then moved on to join Quattro Wireless as vice president of advertising. He then served as head of western and south central US advertising for Apple.

Andrew is the co owner and CEO of Esports organization, NRG Esports. Some of the investors for the company include Shaquille O’neal, Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez.
